name: Club Kiosk
short_description:
Are you a member of a club that has candy and soda for sale for members to purchase? Do your members pay in cash or by marking on a chart? This app aims to allow club members to perform the task of registering purchases on their smartphones via a jQuery Mobile web app, making purchasing items faster and easier for members and the treasurer alike.

The app does not handle the actual payment/billing process - this part left to the individual developer to handle. Rather, it takes as input a "members" table and a "products" table, and each purchase produces a row on a "purchases" table. Data can then be drawn from this table for the purpose of billing members.

Live demo (the back-end is a stub; credentials aren't verified and purchases aren't actually saved): http://www.dsvu-online.dk/anderswebservice/kioskdemo

See the wiki for documentation. If you decide to use this for your project, I'd love to know. Drop a message!
summary: A smartphone web app to make purchases
